title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, March 17, 2021
description: British fiction writer Dame Penelope Margaret Lively celebrates her 88th birthday today. Lively is the author of the children's book “The Ghost of Thomas Kempe”(1973) and the novel “Moon Tiger” (1987).
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
